languages.text: Чтобы взять флагман на абордаж, необходимо ослабить корабельные системы противника.

traits.locale_text: Чтобы взять флагман на абордаж, необходимо ослабить корабельные системы противника.

languages.text: The enemy flagship cannot be boarded until its systems have been sufficiently weakened.
languages.original_text: Чтобы взять флагман на абордаж, необходимо ослабить корабельные системы противника.

traits.locale_text: You must weaken the enemy ship's systems before you can board the flagship.
You must weaken the enemy ship's systems before you can board the flagship.
You must weaken the enemy ship's systems before you can board the flagship.
You must weaken the enemy ship's systems before you can board the flagship.
The enemy flagship cannot be boarded until its systems have been sufficiently weakened.
The enemy flagship cannot be boarded until its systems have been sufficiently weakened.

languages.text: 敵の旗艦のシステムが十分に弱体化されるまで、乗り込むことはできない。
languages.original_text: The enemy flagship cannot be boarded until its systems have been sufficiently weakened.

traits.locale_text: 敵の旗艦のシステムが十分に弱体化されるまで、乗り込むことはできない。

languages.text: Das feindliche Flaggschiff kann erst betreten werden, wenn seine Systeme ausreichend geschwächt sind.
languages.original_text: The enemy flagship cannot be boarded until its systems have been sufficiently weakened.

traits.locale_text: Das feindliche Flaggschiff kann erst betreten werden, wenn seine Systeme ausreichend geschwächt sind.

languages.text: Le vaisseau amiral adverse ne pourra pas être abordé tant que vous n'aurez pas affaibli ses défenses.
languages.original_text: The enemy flagship cannot be boarded until its systems have been sufficiently weakened.

traits.locale_text: Le vaisseau amiral adverse ne pourra pas être abordé tant que vous n'aurez pas affaibli ses défenses.

languages.text: No podrás abordar la nave insignia enemiga hasta que sus sistemas estén lo bastante debilitados.
languages.original_text: The enemy flagship cannot be boarded until its systems have been sufficiently weakened.

traits.locale_text: No podrás abordar la nave insignia enemiga hasta que sus sistemas estén lo bastante debilitados.

languages.text: 行商浪人必须先削弱敌方旗舰的防御能力，才能执行登舰作战。
languages.original_text: The enemy flagship cannot be boarded until its systems have been sufficiently weakened.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人必须先削弱敌方旗舰的防御能力，才能执行登舰作战。

languages.text: Sistemleri yeterince zayıflatılmadan düşman sancak gemisine yanaşmak mümkün değil.
languages.original_text: The enemy flagship cannot be boarded until its systems have been sufficiently weakened.

traits.locale_text: Sistemleri yeterince zayıflatılmadan düşman sancak gemisine yanaşmak mümkün değildir.
